cons: Eating oregano can cause stomach upsets in some people.
description: It has a rich source of dietary fiber, which helps to control blood cholesterol levels.
This herb is an excellent source of minerals like potassium, calcium, manganese, iron, and magnesium.
Fresh herb is an excellent source of antioxidant vitamin, vitamin-C.
Vitamin-C helps the human body develop resistance against infectious agents and scavenge harmful, pro-inflammatory free radicals.
name: Oregano
pros: It has a rich source of dietary fiber, which helps to control blood cholesterol levels.
This herb is an excellent source of minerals like potassium, calcium, manganese, iron, and magnesium.
Fresh herb is an excellent source of antioxidant vitamin, vitamin-C.
Vitamin-C helps the human body develop resistance against infectious agents and scavenge harmful, pro-inflammatory free radicals.
Oregano can be used in pregnancy but in small amount.
